description: Add system health monitoring section to admin dashboard. Display service status: database connectivity (PostgreSQL), cache status (Redis), AI Engine availability, external API status (SAOS, ISAP). Show response times for critical services. Implement health check GraphQL queries calling each service's /health endpoint. Add color-coded status indicators (green=healthy, yellow=degraded, red=down). Display error counts and recent errors from error tracking (Sentry). Show queue sizes: document generation queue depth, email queue depth, webhook delivery queue depth. Implement auto-refresh every 30 seconds.
